content: dovetailed stripes show off the jewel-like colors of chroma as they emerge reminiscent of the vibrant unpredictable gradations of agate or tourmaline worked in a spiral with nothing more complex than single_crochet and chain spaces facets offers eye-catching results even to the novice crocheter a small repeat and a carnival of color choices make it ultimately customizable try a solid and a variegated yarn together for sparkling contrast coordinating solids for classic stripes or two self striping colorways to make a dazzling statement quick to make and quicker to wear facets is sure to become your go-to project for accessorizing your wardrobe chasing the chills or giving away
